item.title: Nicolas Cage’s Upcoming Thriller Is Exactly What I Was Hoping For As A Follow-Up To His Record-Breaking Horror Movie
item.description: The trailer for Nicolas Cage’s latest psychological thriller just dropped and I couldn’t be more excited to see the actor in another creepy role.

item.title: Bohemian Rhapsody Cast: How The Actors Compare To The Queen Band Members
item.description: A musical biopic that won Rami Malek an Oscar, the great Bohemian Rhapsody cast makes the movie sing, and here's how they compare to the real Queen.

item.title: Tyler Perry's War Movie Continues A 16-Nominations Oscars Streak That Dates Back To 1987
item.description: The 2025 Oscars continued a huge record of snubs as Diane Warren was denied an award for her song in The Six Triple Eight after 16 nominations.
